radiographic_examinations.findings: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 3 mm. There is no evidence of stones or gallbladder wall thickening. The pancreas is not well visualized, largely obscured by overlying bowel gas. Spleen normal echogenicity, measuring 9.3 cm. The right kidney measures 10.4 cm. The left kidney measures 10.3 cm. No hydronephrosis is seen on limited views of the kidneys. The visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
